contents.item: It isn’t the lack of opportunities you are facing, more so the lack of confidence
contents.owner: Kevin Abdulrahman, The Book on What Ever You're Into: These Are the 52 Timeless Winning Truths You Need to Know to Have a Chance at Winning

contents.item: To be successful at anything, it takes hard work, discipline, dedication, and a burning desire to be the best.
Those who win are those who think they can.
Striving for success with access of abilities and strength leads to clarity, with clarity confidence naturally comes up.

Dr. John, throughout his whole life, was a man of luck - a man of success. And why? Because he had the eye to see his opportunity, the heart to prompt to well-timed action, the nerve to consummate a perfect work. And no tyrant-passion dragged him back; no enthusiasms, no foibles encumbered his way.
Obstacles are a measure of the intensity of your passion.
Excellence never seeks excuses.
If they aren't laughing at your goals, you are not dreaming big enough.
The idea you implement is more important than the ideas you collect.
If you can't stop thinking about it, don't stop working for it.
Big things often have small beginnings.
To garner the courage to go on creating oneself endlessly is a token of maturity. Create yourself. Create your day.
Nobody is going to hand you success. You have to hand yourself to success.
Stars are howling see moon is caught on fire.
One of the main secrets of success is the ability to foresee the situation a few steps forward.
Often, exactly big complexes force an individual to achieve their big goals and massive success.

To be successful, any business requires a concentrated investment of time and energy; wherein each stage of the development has its tactics and priorities, in regards to which activities and when it makes sense to invest the efforts in.
There's no such thing as perfect. Chasing ''Perfect'' is the shortest road to not achieving it.
You're mind lets you see only what you're looking for. The truth always stands behind the scenes.
The only thing keeping you from living the life you want, is allowing your weaknesses to hold you back. So don't let anything hold you back from achieving your goals".
